gui.choochoo-tweaks.config.title: Minecart Speed Configuration
Use sliders and text fields to configure speeds (0.0 - 10000.0) - Changes auto-save
View-only mode - You need operator permissions to modify speeds
gui.choochoo-tweaks.config.error.title: Configuration Not Available
gui.choochoo-tweaks.config.error.not_in_: You must be in a world to configure minecart speeds.
command.choochoo-tweaks.reset_speeds: Reset all minecart speeds to defaults (0.40)
